tools.name: lexis_crash_order
tools.description: Automates ordering police/crash reports from LexisNexis BuyCrash using Playwright browser automation.
when_to_use: Need to order a police/crash report from LexisNexis
Have a BuyCrash slip with report number
Starting a new MVA case - need to obtain accident report

input_parameters.--interactive: Run with visible browser for debugging/first-time setup
input_parameters.--show-browser: Show browser but don't pause for input

tools.output_format: JSON with success, file_path, and error fields
first_time_setup: 1. Set environment variables: LEXIS_USERNAME and LEXIS_PASSWORD
2. Run with --interactive flag first time to verify login works
3. Tool will save cookies for faster subsequent runs
tools.setup_command: pip install playwright && playwright install chromium
notes: First run MUST use --interactive to verify the automation works
Website selectors may need updating if LexisNexis changes their UI
Saves cookies to /Tools/crash_reports/config/ for session persistence

workflow_integration.next_step: Process with Police Report Analysis skill after download
